gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dga' ba mtha' yas grags pa yi/ /skye ba'i yul ni lha yi 'od ces bya/ /rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/ /dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni lha bzang yin/ /

lha yi 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po sa ldan dga' byed rim gro pa/ /sgra snyan pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/ /bde ba'i stabs shes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs brgyad bcu kun la yang / /nyon

mongs thams cad mthar ni byed pa po/ /bye ba phrag ni nyi shu bzhi bzhi yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri bzhi stong yin/ /dngos med phyin pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang / /dam chos lo grangs stong du gnas par 'gyur/ /thugs

rje chen po mya ngan 'das nas kyang / /rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi tog dag gi/ /skye ba'i yul ni chos snang byed ces bya/ /rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/ /

dpag tshad 'bum yod yab ni yon tan 'od/ /blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po shes byin legs shes rim gro pa/ /yon tan tshogs shes bya ba mkhas pa ste/ /mya ngan 'das stegs bzang po rdzu
'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs sum bcu kun la yang / /tshangs par gnas pa'i pha mthar phyin pa po/ /bye ba phrag ni sum bcu gnyis gnyis yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs sum khri bzhi stong yin/ /dngos po med
par phyin pa'i dam chos dag /lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ /'jig rten mkhyen pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang / /rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab
'gros dag gi/ /skye ba'i yul ni ye shes gzhol zhes bya/ /rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/ /sum stong drug brgya yab ni stegs bzang yin/ /shes rab dga' zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras
po mchog ma sprin ldan rim gro pa/ /bdud 'joms pa ni blo gros can yin te/ /gnas pa mtha' yas pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs brgyad bcu drug kun la'ang / /byang chub mchog gi pha rol phyin

pa po/ /bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu bzhi bzhi yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/ /mya ngan 'das nas dam pa'i chos dag kyang / /lo grangs bdun khri drug stong bar du gnas/ /rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod
rten gcig yin te/ /dpag tshad lnga pa nor bu bla rer ldan/ /'jig rten mgon po spos bzang skye ba yi/ /yul ni spos kyis rnam par brgyan zhes bya/ /rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/ /

dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni legs bzangs yin/ /'od bzangs ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po skar mkhan 'byor pa rim gro pa/ /yon tan 'od bzangs pa ni mkhas pa ste/ /bkod pa mtha' yas pa ni rdzu 'phrul

can/ /'dus pa lan grangs sum bcu gnyis kun la'ang / /mtsho bran rgya mtsho gang ba 'dra ba po/ /bye ba phrag ni bdun bcu bzhi bzhi yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri bzhi stong yin/ /zhi bar phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag

kyang / /lo grangs sum khri bzhi stong bar du gnas/ /rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/ /dpag tshad brgyad pa thams cad rnam par brgyan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dbyings skye ba'i/ /yul ni

rdzu 'phrul snang bar byed ces bya/ /rdul bral rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/ /stong gsum tsam yin bde ba'i dbang po yab/ /dga' ba'i sgra dbyangs rgyal yum me tog sras/ /ku mu da zhes bya ba rim gro pa/ /seng ge'i

rgyal mtshan zhes bya mkhas pa ste/ /dbyangs snyan mchog ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs mtha' yas kun la yang / /brtan rnams byang chub dag la gzhol ba po/ /bye ba phrag ni dpag tu med

pa yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs ther 'bum phrag gsum yin/ /byang chub tu ni yongs su smin bya bya'i phyir/ /dam chos lo grangs ther 'bum phrag gsum gnas/ /grags pa mtha' yas mya ngan 'das nas kyang / /rgyal

ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po lha yi skye ba yi/ /yul ni ngang tshul kun du bsdus shes bya/ /rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/ /stong gsum khams gnyis tsam yab sgron ma yin/ /

spobs pa'i blo gros zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po lha gsal 'byor byed rim gro pa/ /mig legs pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/ /shin du sbyangs pa'i lus ni rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs drug bcu bzhi kun la'ang / /sems

can mchog ma byang chub 'dod pa po/ /bye ba phrag ni khri phrag dgu dgu yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs dag ni 'bum yang yin/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag /lo grangs stong phrag brgyad khri'i bar du gnas/ /mig sbyin mdzad pa mya

ngan 'das nas kyang / /rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi rgyal po yi/ /skye ba'i yul ni lha yis mchod ces bya/ /rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/ /stong khams gcig tsam yab ni

lha bzang yin/ /lha yi dbang phyug ma ni rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po lha yin lha ni rim gro pa/ /tshangs pa 'phags shes bya ba mkhas pa ste/ /lha dbang gtso bo zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs brgyad bcu kun la yang / /gzungs

thob byang chub dag ni 'dod pa po/ /khri phrag dag ni dgu bcu bzhi bzhi yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs bye stong dgu bcu dgu/ /byang chub tu ni yongs su smin bya'i phyir/ /dam chos lo grangs brgyad 'bum bar du gnas/ /rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas

'gyur la/ /mchod rten bzang pos zhing rnams gang bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu gsal ba yi/ /skye ba'i yul ni rin chen gsal zhes bya/ /rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/ /dpag tshad khri yod

yab ni gsal ba yin/ /rin chen mchog ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po dga' ldan legs mthong rim gro pa/ /mig sdug pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/ /rtag pa mthong zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan

grangs drug bcu gnyis kun la'ang / /dgra bcom zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan pa/ /bye ba phrag ni bdun bcu gsum gsum yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri bzhi stong yin/ /'gog par phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang / /
lo grangs bdun khri bzhi stong bar du gnas/ /sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad brgya pa gcig /gser dang nor bu'i lda ldis mdzes par byas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nor bzang skye ba yi/ /yul ni bsod nams

rnam par brgyan zhes bya/ /rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/ /dpag tshad dgu stong rab tu dge ba yab/ /thar pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po ston brtsegs rgyal ba rim gro pa/ /ye shes nga ro

zhes bya mkhas pa ste/ /mdzes par gnas shes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs brgyad bcu kun la yang / /ngar mi 'dzin pa yang srid zad pa po/ /bye ba phrag ni sum bcu gnyis gnyis yod/ /mi tshe lo

grangs sum khri drug stong yin/ /nub par phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang / /lo grangs sum khri bzhi stong bar du gnas/ /rgyal ba de yi sku gdung rgyas 'gyur te/ /zhing rnams dag tu rnam par gang bar 'gyur/ /
'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po nyi shu gsum pa/ mtshungs pa med pa sgron ma skye ba
yi/ /yul ni bsod nams sgron ma zhes kyang bya/ /rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/ /dpag tshad sum stong rnam par gnon pa yab/ /gzi brjid 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po gzi byin sgron ma
rim gro pa/ /sgron ma byed ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/ /'jig rten snang bar byed pa rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs bdun bcu kun la yang / /dgra bcom de dag tshogs par 'gyur ba'i grangs/ /bdun 'bum
bdun 'bum dag ni 'dus par 'gyur/ /mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri chig stong yin/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag /lo grangs bdun khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ /'jig rten phan phyir sku gdung

rgyas 'gyur la/ /rin chen brgya'i dra bas rnam par spras/ /rgyal ba rin chen nga ro dbyangs dag gi/ /skye ba'i yul ni dbyangs dang ldan zhes bya/ /rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/ /dpag tshad brgya stong
yab ni lha lus yin/ /rin chen 'gros shes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po rgyal byin rgal gyur rim gro pa/ /nga rgyal bcad ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/ /nyon mongs gsal zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus

pa lan grangs brgyad bcu kun la yang / /tshul bzhin chos kyi pha rol phyin pa po/ /bye ba phrag ni brgyad bcu gnyis gnyis yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas/ /mya ngan 'das nas dam pa'i

chos dag kyang / /lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ /sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad brgyad pa gcig /rin chen bye ba dag gis rab tu brgyan/ /rgyal ba skye dbang rgyal po skye ba yi/ /yul ni

drag shul snang bar byed ces bya/ /rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/ /dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni khyad par 'phags/ /rgya mtsho'i blo gros zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po rgya mtsho mtsho chen
rim gro pa/ /bdud rtsi dga' zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i stegs bzang rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs drug bcu gnyis kun la'ang / /dngos med phyin pa gti mug med zhi ba/ /

bye ba phrag ni drug bcu gsum gsum yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs drug khri chig stong yin/ /dri ma spangs pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang / /lo grangs drug khri chig stong bar du gnas/ /rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni
rgyas 'gyur la/ /mchod rten bzang pos zhing rnams gang bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan sbed pa yi/ /skye ba'i yul ni sgron ma'i mdangs shes bya/ /rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi
tshad/ /dpag tshad bcu yod yab ni yon tan 'phrul/ /rdzu 'phrul 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po 'phrul can bkod pa rim gro pa/ /blo dang ldan zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/ /'khrul pa med par

sems pa rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs brgyad bcu kun la yang / /dgra bcom thams cad zag pa med pa po/ /bye ba phrag ni nyi shu nyi shu yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri chig stong yin/ /'gog par phyin pa'i

dam pa'i chos dag kyang / /lo grangs nyi khri chig stong bar du gnas/ /rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/ /dpag tshad bdun pa rin po che yis spras/ /'jig rten mgon po dge ba mdzad pa yi/ /skye yul gzi

brjid 'jigs pa med ces bya/ /rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/ /dpag tshad drug bcu yab ni don bstan yin/ /mchog tu brtan zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po kha bsgyur drang po rim gro pa/ /yon tan cha phra 'dzin

pa mkhas pa ste/ /sgron ma gnas shes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs dgu bcu kun la yang / /'jig rten dad pa dgra bcom chags med pa/ /bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu dgu dgu yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs dag ni

brgyad khri yin/ /snang ba med par phyin pa'i dam chos dag /lo grangs dgu khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ /thugs rje chen po mya ngan 'das nas kyang / /rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

seng ge'i blo gros kyi/ /skye ba'i yul ni mdangs snang byed ces bya/ /rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/ /dpag tshad dgu yod yab ni yid 'ong yin/ /lha dga' zhes ni bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po ston byed

mdzes can rim gro pa/ /mchod par 'os shes bya ba mkhas pa ste/ /dad par byed ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs sum bcu kun la yang / /lha yi gnas pa'i pha rol phyin pa po/ /bye ba phrag ni sum

bcu drug drug yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri chig stong yin/ /dam chos lo grangs bye ba'i bar du gnas/ /rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad ni/ /bcu gcig pa gcig gser gyi bla rer ldan/ /rin chen mchog

ma bye bas rnam par spras/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen grags pa yi/ /skye ba'i yul ni gser gyi sgron zhes bya/ /rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/ /dpag tshad bcu gsum yab ni lha bzang yin/ /snyan par grags shes bya ba

rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po legs 'ongs blo ldan rim gro pa/ /yon tan tshogs shes bya ba mkhas pa ste/ /gti mug med par gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs dgu bcu gcig kun la'ang / /thams cad gnas pa

med pa'i lam thob pa/ /bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu dgu dgu yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong yin/ /chags pa med par gyur pa'i dam chos dag /lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong bar du gnas/ /rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas

'gyur la/ /zhing rnams kun du mchod rten bzang pos gang / /sems can snying po don ni mdzad pa yi/ /skye ba'i yul ni lha yis bkod ces bya/ /rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/ /dpag tshad lnga brgya yab ni spong pa

yin/ /grags tog ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po byang chub chos ldan rim gro pa/ /yon tan gnas shes bya ba mkhas pa ste/ /rnam grol gsal shes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs brgyad

bcu kun la yang / /dgra dag choms pa de dag 'dus pa'i grangs/ /bye ba phrag ni 'bum 'bum 'dus par 'gyur/ /mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri chig stong yin/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag /lo grangs
bdun khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad ni/ /bcu gnyis pa gcig gser gyi bla rer ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mdzad mtha' gzigs pa yi/ /skye ba'i yul ni mdzes par
sbyangs shes bya/ /rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/ /dpag tshad drug bcu rnam par dag pa yab/ /byas pa nges shes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po bzang ldan grags byin rim gro pa/ /

mchod rten dga' zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/ /gsal ba gti mug med pa rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs brgyad bcu kun la yang / /dgra dag choms pa de dag kun gyi grangs/ /bye ba phrag ni brgya brgya 'dus par 'gyur/ /

mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/ /mya ngan 'das pa de yi dam chos dag /lo grangs bdun khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/ /stong gsum mchod rten bzang pos gang

bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i me tog gi/ /skye ba'i yul ni grags pa bsgrags shes bya/ /rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/ /sum bcu rtsa lnga yab ni srid mtha' yin/ /blo gros nyi ma zhes
bya brgyal ba'i yum/ /nor lha'i bu sras zla nyi rim gro pa/ /dgra bcom dga' zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/ /'phags pa dad par byed pa rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs brgyad bcu kun la yang / /nga med

nam mkha' dag dang mtshungs pa po/ /bye ba phrag ni brgyad bcu bzhi bzhi yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs brgyad khri nyis stong yin/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag /lo grangs nyi khri chig stong bar du gnas/ /
sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad bcu gsum pa/ /gcig ste rin chen bkod pas rab tu brgyan/ /'jig rten mgon po mdzod spu ldan pa yi/ /skye ba'i yul ni stegs mchog ces kyang bya/ /rigs ni bram
ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum yab ni rab gsal yin/ /brtul zhugs grub ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po zla sdug rab dga' rim gro pa/ /thar pa'i 'gros shes bya ba mkhas

pa ste/ /mya ngan med par gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs nyi shu drug kun la'ang / /ri yi rgyal po lta bur mi g.yo ba/ /bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gsum gsum yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong yin/ /

yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag /lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong bar du gnas/ /rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/ /mchod rten bye ba stong phrag brgyad bcu byung / /sangs rgyas spobs pa mtshungs
med rgyal po yi/ /skye ba'i yul ni sna tshogs mdzes shes bya/ /rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/ /dpag tshad bzhi bcu yab ni skyon med yin/ /yon tan mthong zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /
yon tan can sras blo ldan rim gro pa/ /rgyal mtshan mchog ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/ /nor lha'i bu tog ces bya rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs dgu bcu kun la yang / /chu dang nam mkha' lta

bur gsal ba po/ /bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu gnyis gnyis yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri nyis stong yin/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag /lo grangs dgu khri chig stong bar du gnas/ /'gro la phan phyir rgyal

ba'i sku gdung dag /rgyas par 'gyur te zhing rnams gang bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rnam 'byed nga ro yi/ /skye ba'i yul ni rnam grags lha zhes bya/ /rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/ /nyi shu rtsa gnyis yab
ni ngos bzangs yin/ /mtshan ldan ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /bsod nams 'dod sras gtso bo rim gro pa/ /brtul zhugs grub ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/ /chags pa med par gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus

pa lan grangs sum bcu gsum kun la'ang / /dri bral 'jig rten dri ma'i dri med pa/ /bye ba phrag ni sum bcu gnyis gnyis yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs sum khri bzhi stong yin/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag /
lo grangs sum khri chig stong bar du gnas/ /rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad ni/ /drug bcu pa gcig gser gyi bla rer ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i mche ba yi/ /skye ba'i yul

ni bro ba'i mchog ces bya/ /rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/ /bye ba phrag gsum glang chen dbang po yab/ /thar pa'i dbyangs ni rgyal yum lta byed sras/ /na tshod bzang po zhes bya rim gro pa/ /yon

tan tshogs shes bya ba mkhas pa ste/ /rnam par grol ba'i bkod pa rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs drug bcu kun la yang / /spyod pa 'khrul pa med par gyur pa po/ /bye ba phrag ni drug bcu bdun bdun yod/ /

mi tshe lo grangs drug khri bzhi stong yin/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag /lo grangs drug khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur te/ /zhing rnams mchod rten dag gis gang
bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes par gshegs pa yi/ /skye ba'i yul ni bden pa gsal zhes bya/ /rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/ /dgu bcu rtsa bzhi yab ni bkod pa yin/ /gzi brjid chen

mo zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po des pa bzang po rim gro pa/ /yid 'jam pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/ /byang chub drang po zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs nyi shu lnga kun la'ang / /legs dul yid

ldan glang po 'dra ba po/ /bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu dgu dgu yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri bzhi stong yin/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag /lo grangs dgu khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i sku

gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/ /dpag tshad bzhi pa bkod pa yid du 'ong / /de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams sgron ma yi/ /skye ba'i yul ni sgron ma'i tog ces bya/ /rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/ /dpag tshad bcu

yod yab ni lha bzang yin/ /grags mchog ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po 'phrul can mthu rtsal rim gro pa/ /mchod rten grags shes bya ba mkhas pa ste/ /gzungs kyi rgyal po zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/ /

'dus pa lan grangs drug bcu kun la yang / /srid pa kun las rnam grol yid ldan pa/ /bye ba phrag ni drug bcu lnga lnga yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri nyis stong yin/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag /lo grangs bdun

khri drug stong bar du gnas/ /'gro la phan phyir rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag /rgyas par 'gyur te zhing rnams gang bar 'gyur/ /sems can snying po bkra shis ldan pa yi/ /skye ba'i yul ni gzi brjid gsal zhes bya/ /

rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/ /dpag tshad khri yod yab ni lha dbang yin/ /spyod pa can zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po yid 'ong snang ldan rim gro pa/ /chos kyi 'od ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/ /yon

tan mchog la gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs dgu bcu gsum kun la'ang / /srid pa'i mdud pa thams cad rnam grol ba/ /bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu lnga lnga yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong yin/ /
mya ngan 'das pa de yi dam chos dag /lo grangs dgu khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ /sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad brgyad pa gcig /gser dang nor bu'i lda ldis mdzes par byas/ /rgyal ba yul 'khor mya

ngan med pa yi/ /skye ba'i yul ni mya ngan sel zhes bya/ /rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/ /dpag tshad dgu bcu yab ni dul ba yin/ /nyes pa spong zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po tshal 'dor drag
shul rim gro pa/ /yon tan mig ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/ /grags pa rnam par sprul pa rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs brgyad bcu kun la yang / /dul ba'i yid ldan bsgoms pa'i

bdag nyid can/ /bye ba phrag ni brgya brgya 'dus par 'gyur/ /mi tshe lo grangs brgyad khri sum stong yin/ /dam pa'i chos dag lo grangs stong phrag ni/ /brgyad bcu rtsa gsum bar du gnas par 'gyur/ /'gro la

phan phyir rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag /rgyas par 'gyur te zhing rnams gang bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros sems pa yi/ /skye ba'i yul ni yid tshim byed ces bya/ /rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/ /dpag

tshad stong yod rdzu 'phrul lha ni yab/ /yid gnyis 'dod ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po lta byed des pa rim gro pa/ /shes rab 'phags shes bya ba mkhas pa ste/ /mchog rgyal brtul zhugs zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/ /

'dus pa lan grangs brgyad bcu gcig kun la'ang / /bag chags pha mthar phyin pa'i bsam gtan pa/ /bye ba phrag ni brgyad bcu gnyis gnyis yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs brgyad khri lnga stong yin/ /yongs su mya ngan

'das nas dam chos dag /lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ /sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa/ /gcig ste nor bu bzang po'i dra bas spras/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo dang ldan pa yi/ /
skye ba'i yul ni shes rab gsal zhes bya/ /rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/ /dpag tshad gsum yod yab ni chos bzangs yin/ /thar pa'i brtul zhugs zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po
tog ldan legs sems rim gro pa/ /bdud rtsi dga' zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/ /bkod pa gsal zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs brgyad bcu kun la yang / /srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha
mthar phyin pa po/ /bye ba phrag ni brgyad bcu gnyis gnyis yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/ /snang ba med par phyin pa'i dam chos dag /lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ /
rgyal ba'i mchod rten dpag tshad bcu gsum pa/ /rin chen mang po'i dra bas mdzes par byas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgron ma spyan/ /skye ba'i yul ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan yin/ /rgyal ba'i rigs ni
rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/ /dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni blo gros can/ /zla mchog ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po zlas byin 'jam pa'i rim gro pa/ /spobs pa sems ni blo gros can yin te/ /'khrugs

pa med par gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs drug bcu bzhi kun la'ang / /nga rgyal sred pa'i dra ba 'jig pa po/ /bye ba phrag ni drug bcu lnga lnga yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs drug khri drug stong yin/ /yongs

su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag /lo grangs drug khri lnga stong bar du gnas/ /thugs rje can gyi sku gdung rgyas 'gyur la/ /rin chen bye ba dag gis rab tu brgyan/ /'jig rten mgon po shin du gzigs pa yi/ /

skye ba'i yul ni gzi brjid sgron zhes bya/ /rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/ /dpag tshad lnga brgya yab ni zhum med yin/ /blo brtan 'dzin ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po blo ldan blo bzangs
rim gro pa/ /rnam par snang byed ces bya mkhas pa ste/ /'jig rten sgra la 'jug pa rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs drug bcu drug kun la'ang / /dug rtsa bcad dang mtshungs pa'i dgra bcom pa/ /
bye ba phrag ni drug bcu gsum gsum yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs drug khri sum stong yin/ /rgyal ba mya ngan 'das pa'i dam chos dag /lo grangs drug khri drug stong bar du gnas/ /'jig rten phan phyir rgyal
ba'i sku gdung dag /rgyas 'gyur khams gsum dag tu gang bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shugs kyis 'dor ba yi/ /skye ba'i yul ni dga' ba gsal zhes bya/ /rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/ /
dpag tshad bcu yod yab ni legs byin yin/ /mchog sbyin 'jug ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po zla ldan zlas byin rim gro pa/ /rdo rje'i 'gros zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/ /'byor pa gsal zhes bya ba

rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs bdun bcu kun la yang / /dri med tshul 'chos med pa'i dgra bcom pa/ /bye ba phrag ni bdun bcu bzhi bzhi yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/ /rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag /

lo grangs bdun khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ /'gro la phan phyir byams ldan rgyal ba yi/ /sku gdung rgyas 'gyur rnam par gang bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stobs can skye ba yi/ /yul ni gdul bar dka' ba zhes kyang bya/ /rgyal

ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/ /dpag tshad sum bcu yab ni zhum med yin/ /bsod nams can zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po skrun byed gnyi ga rim gro pa/ /nor bu rkang zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/ /gser sgron zhes bya ba ni

rdzu 'phrul can/ /de na 'dus pa lan grangs drug bcu ste/ /thams cad dag la bye ba dag ni phrag /dgu bcu rtsa ni bzhi bzhi tshang bar 'gyur/ /mi tshe lo grangs brgyad khri brgyad stong yin/ /'khrugs pa med par phyin pa'i dam chos

dag /lo grangs dgu khri nyis stong bar du gnas/ /sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad rangs pa gcig /nor bu'i gdugs dang bkod pa bla rer ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab me tog gi/ /skye ba'i yul ni mkhas pa

gsal zhes bya/ /rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/ /dpag tshad gsum yod yab ni dbyen med yin/ /'brug sgra zhes ni bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po sgom byed dul ba rim gro pa/ /yon tan 'od bzangs zhes

bya mkhas pa ste/ /lha yi gzhal med mtshungs pa rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs lnga bcu kun la yang / /dgra bcom bdud rnams 'joms par byed pa po/ /bye ba phrag ni lnga bcu lnga lnga yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs

brgyad khri lnga stong yin/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag /lo grangs bzhi khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/ /mchod rten bzang pos stong gsum gang bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa brtan pa'i dbyangs skye ba'i/ /yul ni drag shul sgra dag 'byung zhes bya/ /rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/ /dpag tshad dgu stong yab ni gnas pa mchog /gser gyi mdog ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /'jig rten

lam sras sgron ma rim gro pa/ /yon tan mchog ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/ /ku mu da yi snying po rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs drug bcu gnyis kun la'ang / /bag chags rtsa nas bton pa'i dgra bcom pa/ /bye ba phrag

ni drug bcu brgyad brgyad yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong yin/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag /lo grangs drug khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ /'gro la phan phyir rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag /rgyas

'gyur zhing rnams rnam par gang bar 'gyur/ /sems can snying po bde dang ldan pa yi/ /skye yul gzi brjid yid du 'thad ces bya/ /rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/ /dgu bcu rtsa dgu ljon pa'i dbang po yab/ /me tog

sgron ma zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po tsam ka mchog ma rim gro pa/ /brtul zhugs lha zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/ /bkod pa mi 'khrugs pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs brgyad bcu rtsa lnga la/ /dgra

bcom thams cad tha ba spangs pa po/ /sa dag dang ni mtshungs pa sha stag go/ /mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri sum stong yin/ /rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag /lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ /rgyal
ba'i mchod rten dpag tshad bcu gcig pa/ /rin chen brgya yi dra bas mdzes par byas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa don dag gsung ba yi/ /skye ba'i yul ni smra ba gsal zhes bya/ /rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi

tshad/ /dpag tshad nyis stong yab ni zla bzangs yin/ /sprin gyi 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po 'od ldan snang ba rim gro pa/ /snang ba byed ces bya ba blo can te/ /yid 'ong gsal zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/ /

'dus pa dag ni lan grangs ther 'bum phrag /bcu ste thams cad la yang bsam gtan pa/ /ther 'bum ther 'bum dag ni 'dus par 'gyur/ /mi tshe lo grangs dag ni 'bum yang yin/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag /lo grangs

stong snyed kho nar gnas par 'gyur/ /'gro la phan phyir rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag /rgyas 'gyur zhing rnams rnam par gang bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa gsal ba yi/ /skye ba'i yul ni dga' byed mchog ces bya/ /

rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/ /dpag tshad 'bum yod mi 'khrugs pa ni yab/ /bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po bdud rtsi rnam grol rim gro pa/ /seng ge'i nga ro zhes bya mkhas pa ste/ /gnas pa'i

mi 'khrugs pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs sum bcu drug kun la'ang / /thams cad gnas shes pa la mkhas pa po/ /bye ba phrag ni sum bcu lnga lnga yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs sum khri drug stong yin/ /yongs

su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag /lo grangs drug khri drug stong bar du gnas/ /sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad gsum pa gcig /rin chen mchog gi dra bas mdzes par byas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i zhal

skye ba'i/ /yul ni smra ba'i mchod rten zhes kyang bya/ /de yi rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/ /dpag tshad stong yod yab ni gzi brjid bzang / /gos la dga' zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po kha sgyur legs gnas rim gro pa/ /ye
shes zil gyis gnon pa mkhas pa ste/ /mya ngan med par gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs bdun bcu kun la yang / /gti mug med pa'i pha mthar phyin 'phags pa/ /bye ba phrag ni bdun bcu brgyad

brgyad yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri bzhi stong yin/ /mya ngan 'das pa de yi dam chos dag /lo grangs bdun khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i don dang phan phyir rgyal ba yi/ /sku gdung dag ni rnam par rgyas par

'gyur/ /mi yi 'dren pa gtsug phud skye ba yi/ /yul ni rin chen brtsegs pa zhes kyang bya/ /de'i rigs bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/ /dpag tshad bdun bcu yab ni tog bzangs yin/ /snang ba sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal

ba'i yum/ /sras po lha legs sgra gcan rim gro pa/ /spobs pa dran pa blo gros can yin te/ /rnam par sprul pa'i tog ni rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus pa lan grangs brgyad bcu drug kun la'ang / /'jigs pa med pa'i

gnas mchog thob pa po/ /bye ba phrag ni brgyad bcu bdun bdun yod/ /mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/ /rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag /lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba thugs

rje chen po mtshungs med pa'i/ /sku gdung dag ni rnam par rgyas par 'gyur/ /mi yi 'dren pa snang ba mdzad pa'i/ /skye ba'i yul ni gzi brjid grags shes bya/ /rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/ /dpag tu med pa
yab ni legs mthong yin/ /blta bar 'os shes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ /sras po mthu rtsal mngar can rim gro pa/ /snang bar byed pa blo gros can yin te/ /chags med gti mug med pa rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus
pa thun mong ma yin dpag tu med/ /mi rnams dag gi tshe tshad dpag tu med/ /sangs rgyas dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi/ /mdzad pa ji snyed pa kun des mdzad 'gyur/ /'jig rten
phan phyir sems can snying po dag /mya ngan 'das nas dam chos gnas 'gyur ba'i/ /lo grangs stong phrag dag ni mtha' yang yas/ /rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur/ /
de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/ /bskal pa bzang po pa'i sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gang dang gang dag la dang por byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bkur sti bgyis nas/
byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag lung bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i
rgyal po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta legs so zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi yi zla de la/ /gser las byas pa'i gdugs dag phul nas
kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

gser thub phreng rgyud tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stabs de la/ /snang ma'i me tog dag gi phreng ba phul/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs 'od srung bram ze'i bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa tsam pa'i mchog de la/ /ska rags dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /nga ni sngon tshe sman par gyur pa na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub de la/ /'jams gang zhig ni

dbul bar byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'khor los bsgyur ba yi/ /rgyal po rnam par snang byed ces byar gyur pa na/ /bde gshegs mthu chen gdugs tshod dag la

spyan drangs nas/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge dag gis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nga ro snyan de la/ /phyag dar khrod kyi lhan pa thal mo tsam/ /phul nas dang por byang chub sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs rab gsal tshong

par gyur pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas 'od de la/ /nor bu rin po che dag phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa dag gis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yid

'thad gzigs de la/ /mu tig dag las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs me tog grong khyer rten pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur de la/ /la tu dag ni dbul

ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gnyis pa yis/ /bde gshegs mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal de la/ /tshems shing dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub

tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spyan legs khyim bdag tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa legs par sgra sgrogs la/ /khang pa brtsegs pa dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

ded dpon dag gis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa mthong de la/ /tsan dan dmar po'i khri'u dag phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs lag chen rol mo mkhan gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

mchog grags grong khyer du/ /bde gshegs de la gling bus mchod nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs stobs chen spos 'tshong bur gyur tshe/ /bde gshegs seng blo grong khyer gshegs pa na/ /a ga ru'i

rdog ma phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs rgyu skar rgyal po phyugs rdzi'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs byin de la ni/ /kha la'i me tog dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni

sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs rtsi sman shing rta mkhan gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri zhim de la ni/ /ting lo mar me bcas pa phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs snyan pa tha ga par gyur tshe/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa mar me'i glog 'gyu la/ /ras kyi kha tshar dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs tog zhing par gyur pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i 'od zer la/ /me tog sil ma dag gis

gtor nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs 'od chen grong khyer rten pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma chen po ste/ /drang srong de la mar me phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde

gshegs grol phung lham mkhan gyur pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs de la/ /mchil lham zung cig dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs rnam snang 'khor los sgyur ba'i

tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis 'joms de la/ /ta li ba ti brgyad khri bzhi stong phul/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs nyi snying bram ze'i bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mtha' yas

la/ /ko sha ta ka'i me tog phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs zla ba gser mgar bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i zhal de la/ /rin po che yi sdong bu phul nas kyang / /

dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs 'od 'phro grong khyer rten pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas 'od de la/ /rtswa'i sgron ma dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /

bde gshegs 'od bzangs nags tshal srung gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yid 'ong gzi brjid la/ /tsam pa ka yi me tog phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs mya ngan med pa tshong dpon bus/ /de

bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis rnam 'jig la/ /kar ni ka yi me tog phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs skar rgyal khyim bdag bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams sgron de la/ /

nor bu rin chen mchil lham zung cig phul/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs rab gsal rgya mtsho'i tshong pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong de la/ /tsan dan dmar po'i gzims khri phul nas

kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs phreng thogs khyim bdag bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yid 'ong gzi brjid la/ /ka ka ni ya'i bdug spos gsol nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems

bskyed do/ /bde gshegs yon tan 'od ni gser rtog tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtshungs pa med de la/ /me tog gcig cig dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs don gzigs

'khor los sgyur rgyal tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med mdzod la/ /khang pa brtsegs pa stong snyed phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs mar me spos 'bru mar 'tshongs
bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rol par snang ba gang / /bye ba drug bcu'i 'khor bcas dag la khrus khang gcig /phul nas dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs mthu
ldan gos 'tshong gyur pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rgyas de la/ /ras bcos leb leb po dag phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs sman pa sman

pa'i bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal mtshan bral de la/ /spos kyi ri lu dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs des pa 'bru mar mkhan gyi tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags 'joms mdzad

de la/ /mar me kha cig dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs mdzod spu phreng rgyud mkhan gyi tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gzigs de la/ /ud pal dmar po dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por

byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs brtan ldan stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub de la ni/ /rin po che las byas pa'i gdan khri grangs brgyad bcu/ /rtsa bzhi phul nas dang por byang chub

tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs lha dpal rgya mtsho'i tshong par gyur pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid phung po'i 'od de la/ /nor bu rin chen bla re dpag tshad gcig snang ba/ /phul nas dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /

bde gshegs gdul dka' shing 'tshong gyur pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brtan par gshegs de la/ /tshems shing dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal mtshan chu'i/ /

sbyin bdag gyur tshe bde gshegs yid 'ong grags/ /de la chu snod dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs sgra gcan phreng rgyud mkhan bu'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gzugs
de la/ /gser gyi mchil lham zung cig phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs tshogs can khrus par gyur pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rab dang ba la/ /khrus kyi

chal dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs dbyangs phyugs rdzir gyur pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan dang por mngon rdzogs par/ /

sangs rgyas gyur pa'i tshe na de la phye bre gang / /phul nas dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs tshigs brtan 'gron bu de 'tshong bur/ /gyur tshe bde gshegs mi g.yor gshegs pa la/ /'gron bu spar gang

gtor de phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs mi 'gying rgyal bu dga' 'dod tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa mtha' yas la/ /glu dbyangs dag gis mchod pa byas nas kyang / /

dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs 'od mdzad 'khor lo bsgyur rgyal tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid brtsegs 'od la/ /na bza' rin po che dag phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po chen po yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo gnas de la ni/ /me tog mya ngan 'tshang ba bdun phul nas/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs rdo rje lha dbang brgya byin du/ /gyur tshe

de bzhin gshegs pa brtan pa la/ /me tog man dA ra ba'i char phab nas/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sdom can 'dzam gling gi/ /rgyal por gyur tshe bde gshegs thar dgyes la/ /gser

las byas pa'i bla re phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs mi bsnyings rol mo mkhan gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs sbyin de la/ /rol mo'i bkur stir rnga chen

brdungs nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs rin chen blo mchog gyur pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi mdzod de la/ /spos kyis bsgos pa'i phreng ba phul nas kyang / /

dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs pad ldan 'khrul 'khor mkhan gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gzigs de la/ /khri'u bzangs gcig cig dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems

bskyed do/ /bde gshegs stobs sde rgyal po'i sman pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhon pa che ldan la/ /skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs me tog 'od zer

gser mgar gyi/ /bur gyur tshe na bde gshegs kun gzigs la/ /rin po che yi phreng ba phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs shes dgyes byis pa'i rgyan byed tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yul phyogs kun

mchod la/ /mig dang bdug pa dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs gzi chen tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rab dpal de la/ /na bza'i bla re dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por

byang chub du ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs tshangs pa bag chos mkhan gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa bla ma la/ /sha kha ra'i ril lu phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs 'od dpag med pa gla mi'i tshe/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i 'od de la/ /gdugs gcig cig ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa klu sbyin phreng rgyud tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rnam bsgyings la/ /

me tog dag gi chun po phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs brtan gshegs nor bu mkhan gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis spong de la/ /rin po che'i dra ba phul nas kyang / /

dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs don yod mthong ba nad pa'i gsos sman la/ /sbyor mkhas bur gyur tshe na dge slong dge 'dun dag /spyan drangs nad sman sbyar nas bde gshegs legs mthong la/ /

dang po kho nar byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs brtson 'grus sbyin pa 'khor los sgyur rgyal tshe/ /tsan dan dmar po dag las gtsug lag khang brgya stong / /byas te ras bcos g.yogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa po/ /

bdud rtsi'i stobs la dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs bzang skyong gis ni bde gshegs zla ba'i 'od/ /nyan thos bcas pa'i dge 'dun 'khor bcas khri phrag bcu/ /zhag bdun bar du zhal zas ro ni brgya ldan pas/ /

tshim par mdzad de dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs dga' bo rtsal chen bram ze'i bur/ /gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mchog grags la/ /yu ba nor bus spras pa'i rnga yab gcig /phul nas dang por

byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'chi med rgyal po yi/ /pho nyar gyur tshe bde gshegs dbang sbas la/ /pan tsa li'i 'bras bu phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs

seng ge'i rgyal mtshan zhing pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nga ro gsal de la/ /skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs rgyal ba tshal gyi las byed tshe/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa thogs med 'khor lo la/ /a ru ra'i 'bras bu phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos ldan dpa' bo'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i nga ro la/ /rgyal mtshan dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por

byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs mchog dga' rgyal po spos 'tshong tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mchod rten la/ /phye ma spar gang phul te gtor nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /

bde gshegs kha lo bsgyur ba byis pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul la/ /pa la ba ta gsum zhig phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs dga' gshegs rgyal po'i

bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po la/ /dngul gyi me tog dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chu lha tshong pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog dpag med la/ /

lhung bzed sbrang rtsis bkang ste phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs yon tan lag ni rtse ba'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stobs chen de la ni/ /'chag sa khru brgyad khor yug bkram nas

kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs spos glang spos 'tshong bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa rnam grol gyi/ /'chag sa spos kyi chu yis chag chag btab/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /

bde gshegs rnam gzigs gos 'tshong gyur pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pa sgrib med la/ /me tog gi ni gdugs dag phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs 'brug sgra rdza mkhan gyur pa'i tshe/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stabs de la/ /spos dang ril ba gcig cig phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs legs sems khye'u lo gsum lon pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rnam

gzigs la/ /pad ma dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs yid bzang tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rtsal sbyin de la ni/ /sna ma'i me tog phreng ba

phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs dri med tha ga par gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa legs mthong de la ni/ /'ba' sha go gcig dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems

bskyed do/ /bde gshegs zla ba glang chen 'dul ba'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs bzang de la ni/ /me tog phreng ba khru gang phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs grags chen grong khyer rten

pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros grags de la/ /me tog dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs gtsug na nor bu khye'u'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bkod de la/ /sa rdul

spar gang dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa drag shul lha'i bu'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spa ba'i 'od de la/ /lha yi gzhal med khang gcig phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni
sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs seng stabs gdugs mkhan gyur pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thar par bzhud de la/ /tsha ba'i dus tshe lo ma'i gdugs phul nas/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems

bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ljon pa phyugs rdzi'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bkod de la/ /lam gyi shing drung dag tu be'u ras phul/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs rnam rgyal ba lang

rdzi'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i blo de la/ /lhung bzed 'o mas bkang ste phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs shes rab brtsegs pa dge slong tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
ye shes tog de la/ /nyin gcig rangs par chos kyi gdan phul nas/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs legs gnas lham mkhan gyur pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo'i blo de la/ /

mchil lham rim pa gcig pa phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros las byed tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa'i blo gros la/ /ro dang ldan pa'i btung ba phul nas kyang / /

dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs yan lag skyes ni mi 'dzin tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs bzang de la ni/ /khrus ras dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa blo mtha' yas pa ni/ /lam ston gyur tshe bde gshegs bden smra la/ /shing drung gnas mal dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs bzang sde

dpon tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skar dbyangs de la ni/ /me tog ud pal lnga zhig phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs mkhyen ldan dgon gnas dge slong tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

legs par mthong de yi/ /'chag sa'i byi dor dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs 'od zer shing rta mkhan gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mtha' yas la/ /nyal khri stong ri ba dag phul

nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs brtan pa ni/ /phreng rgyud mkhan tshe bde gshegs yid 'ong sems/ /de la me tog bla re phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa bkra shis shing thun tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i shing rta la/ /bu yug langs tshe snang ma bltam nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bden tog khrus pa'i tshe/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan me tog la/ /kha gdong bkru ba dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs pad ma tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od zer la/ /pad ma dag ni

dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sred med bu ni spos 'tshong tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gdul bar dka' zhes bya ba de'i/ /khang pa brtsegs pa tsan dan dmar pos byugs nas kyang / /

dang po kho nar byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lag bzangs rgyal po'i pho nya'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan sgrogs par mdzad pa gang / /'khor bcas bye ba dag la chos gos gsum phul nas/ /

dang po kho nar byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas ni/ /tshan po cher gyur g.yul ngor chags pa'i tshe/ /bde gshegs legs mthong la ni rgyal mtshan gcig /phul nas dang por byang chub tu ni sems

bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro sman pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skye bo'i mchod rten la/ /spos kyi ring bu dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs

byin lam ston tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chen zhes bya ba/ /de la lam dag mtshon pa byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs rin chen 'byung gnas mnyan pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

rdzi ba med gshegs de/ /nyan thos 'khor bcas bye ba bsgral nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs lha yi me tog nor bu mkhan/ /gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs pa blo gsal la/ /nor bu rin chen spras
pa'i gdugs phul nas/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs don legs sems pa rgyal bu'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsung snyan de la ni/ /nor bu rin chen spras pa'i bla re phul/ /

dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs chos kyi dbang phyug shing mkhan gyi/ /bur gyur tshe na bde gshegs skar 'od kyi/ /gshegs zam dag ni bsham pa byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems
bskyed do/ /bde gshegs blo grags kun dga' ra srungs tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i sgron de la/ /mon sran gre'u yi me tog phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs

spobs brtsegs tshong pa'i bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes tog de la/ /sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pas spyan drangs nas/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i
rgyal mtshan ni/ /tshal gyi las byed tshe na de bzhin gshegs/ /bsod nams bkod de la ni a mra phul/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phan bzhed grong dpon bur
gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams 'od ces bya ba las/ /nyin gcig srog gcod spong ba'i bslab gzhi mnos nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs rnam rol

grong rdal byis pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas la/ /lhung bzed sbrang rtsis bkang ste phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mun dang bral ba yis/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa srid mtha' gzigs de la/ /mon sran gre'u 'bru mar me bzhag phul nas/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs sgra gcan lha ni grong rten tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dga'

bar gzigs de la/ /hasta bar sha ka dag phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs ri bo'i rgyal mtshan tshogs ldan gyi/ /khye 'ur gyur tshe bde gshegs mtha' yas 'od/ /de la me tog chun po phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub

tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs tshogs can 'od ni phreng rgyud tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yid 'ong dbyangs de la/ /me tog las byas bla re phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /
bde gshegs rin chen snying po khrus pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs gsung ba la/ /kha gdong bkru ba dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs shin

du mthor gshegs grong khyer rten pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims stabs de grong khyer du/ /gshegs pa'i tshe na gdan dag bshams te bting nas kyang / /dang po kho nar byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde
gshegs skar rgyal da nur mkhan gyi tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor lha de la/ /zhal zas bca' ba rnams ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs ru rings
gzhan gyi khol gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dga' de la/ /lhung bzed 'jams kyis bkang ste phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs yon tan grags pa bsod

snyoms tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas la/ /gos kyi ras ma sor bzhi tsam phul nas/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zlas bde gshegs srid sbyin de/ /'khor bcas bye ba sum bcu dag la gtsug

lag khang / /bzang por longs spyod phyir dang dpag tshad bcu pa'i gos/ /gding ba phul nas dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs nyi 'od gzhan gyi khol gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po che de la/ /
lcags kyi snod dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs skar mkhan tshong pa'i bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs gsal de la ni/ /nor bu rin chen
dpag tshad gcig 'od ldan/ /phul nas dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng tog ded dpon gyi/ /bur gyur tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa po/ /blo gros bzang la phreng ba phul nas
kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen rgyal po ni/ /snyan dngags mkhan tshe bde gshegs tsam mchog la/ /tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod nas
kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po yis/ /gzhan gyi dge 'dun bshos gsol yi rang nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen po la/ /dang por
byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs srid mtha' gzigs pa tshal dag gi/ /las byed tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa po/ /khyed par sems la chab gtsang phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni

sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs glog 'od rngon pa'i bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo'i sems de la/ /rtswa'i stan dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs

seng ges byin pa khyim bdag gi/ /bur gyur tshe na bde gshegs pad snying la/ /sna ma'i me tog yod pa'i sa gzhi phul/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal mtshan gyis/ /'jigs

bcas lam du 'dron pa'i bsel byas nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sred med bu de la/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs mchog dga' grags pa bu ram shing / /mtshir gyur tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa po/ /blo rnam

'byed la bu ram bcud khu phul/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs brtson 'grus brtan pa bram ze'i bur/ /gyur tshe bde gshegs 'od zer mtha' yas la/ /khrus rkyen 'dag pa'i chal dag phul nas

kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs grags rdzogs chang 'tshong bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i nga ro la/ /lo ma'i snod nas chu dag phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni

sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs bsnyengs bral rgyal po'i bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po'i nga ro la/ /lo ma'i snod nas bar sha'i me tog phul/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs
mchod 'os lha ni blon mchog gyur pa'i tshe/ /bde gshegs yid 'ong blo 'od dag la dpag tshad gcig /khor yug tsam gyi bskyed mos tshal phul a ga ru'i/ /bdug pas bdugs te dang por byang chub tu ni sems
bskyed do/ /bde gshegs sgron chen mi bkren gyur pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams 'od de la/ /rtswa'i sgron ma dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /

bde gshegs 'jig rten 'od ni lha'i bu'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de la/ /me tog man dA ra ba'i gdugs phul nas/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs spos dri zhim pa gyad gyur tshe/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag mdzes de la/ /khrus ras dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs yon tan mchog 'dzin sman pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnyog pa med don

la/ /bdug pa dang ni dar yug phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs mun ngad rnam bral rgyal po yi/ /mdun 'don bur gyur tshe na de bzhin gshegs/ /dgra bcom gzi la mu tig rgyan

phreng phul/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'gram pa yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de la/ /'dam rdzab dag tu shing zam btsugs phul nas/ /dang por byang chub

tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs rin chen grags pa spos 'tshong gi/ /bur gyur tshe na bde gshegs dbyangs mnga' la/ /phye ma spar gang dag ni gtor phul nas/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /

bde gshegs skyon rab zhi ba rgyal bu'i tshe/ /gsad bya btson dag 'bros su btang nas kyang / /de bzhin gshegs pa sa mchog de la ni/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs bdud rtsi 'chang ba grong dpon tshe/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa 'od 'bar de la ni/ /bai dUr+ya'i gdugs stong phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs mi zla phreng rgyud mkhan bu'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nges par sems de la/ /

ud pa la'i phreng ba phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shin du gzigs pa ni/ /'dun dpon tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa po/ /bden par gsung ba de la phreng ba phul/ /

dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs rab brgyan grong khyer la rten pa'i/ /bur gyur tshe na bde gshegs mdangs 'od kyi/ /grong khyer sgo dag mdzes par byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /

bde gshegs nor 'od brgya byin gyur pa'i tshe/ /bde gshegs gzi brjid me tog rgyas pa la/ /dpag tshad khor yug me tog char phab nas/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'byung gnas kyis/ /

bde gshegs grags tog shes rab pha rol phyin/ /gsung tshe legs gsungs zhes ni yi rang phul/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs don nges ldan pa tha ga par/ /gyur tshe bde gshegs yon tan gsal

ba la/ /ras kyi kha tshar dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs tshems sbyin blo chen bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgron de la/ /bsil yab dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /

dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs rin chen 'byung gnas gzhu mkhan tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsal rab dpal de la/ /me tog snyim pa bkang ste gtor nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /

bde gshegs skye dbang mtshungs pa rdza mkhan tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhal sdug sde bdag la/ /snod dag chu yis bkang ste phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs stabs gshegs

zhing pa'i bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stabs bzhud la/ /zam stegs dag ni gzugs pa byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs blo gnas shing srung bur gyur tshe/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa skye bo'i mchod rten la/ /se 'bru dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs gdugs mdzes blon po'i bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

rgya mtsho'i blo de la/ /tsam pa'i me tog phreng ba phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo gser mgar tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i snying po la/ /bdug pas

bdugs pa'i me tog gtor nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs shin du 'phags dpal spos 'tshong bur/ /gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs sde yi/ /'chag sa spos chus chag chag

btab nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs seng ge'i sgra ni rnga mkhan tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i rgyal po la/ /rnga bo che dag brdung ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems
bskyed do/ /bde gshegs rnam rol ldan pa dung 'bud mkhan/ /gyur tshe bde gshegs nyi ma'i snying po de/ /grong khyer gshegs tshe dung dag bus nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /

'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa klu 'od zla ba'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub dga' de la/ /rnga bo che dag brdung ba byas nas kyang / /dang por

byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs me tog ri bo gar mkhan bur/ /gyur tshe bde bar gshegs pa rab tu zhi de la/ /spyan sngar bro gar dag gis mchod nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs

klu dga' gar mkhan bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od de la/ /rol mo'i sgra dag bsgrags pa byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs spos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po yi/ /sras mor gyur

tshe de bzhin gshegs pa po/ /pad dkar spos la mu tig rgyan phreng phul/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs shin du grags pa tshong dpon gyi/ /chung mar gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs pa po/ /lhun po'i 'od zer spyi bor

bla re phul/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs stobs lha grong khyer rten pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i zhal de la/ /bshos dron lhung bzed bkang ste phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems

bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan phreng ldan gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsgyings ldan bzhud de la/ /sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal thal mo lan gsum sbyar/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa klu

lag grong khyer gyi/ /sgo srungs tshe na phyag dar byas nas kyang / /de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs rnams lta de la/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mig brgyan rgyal bu'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos

kyi 'od de la/ /chu dang skyu ru ra dag phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs tshul khrims gsal de snga dro zhig /de bzhin gshegs pa legs par sbyangs pa'i blos/ /dga' bas sangs rgyas rjes su

dran byas nas/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zil gnon ye shes kyis/ /ngan 'gror 'gro ba tshul khrims la bkod nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas blo de la/ /dang por byang chub tu ni
sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs mtha' yas spyan ni gos 'tshong tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gzugs de la/ /ras bcos bla re dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde
gshegs bden gsung khyim bdag bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus brtan de la/ /me tog dag las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas/ /dang por

byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs nyi 'od bca' ba mkhan bu'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lha yis mchod de la/ /la du dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa des blo bzo mkhan tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas blo de la/ /gding ba dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs mtha' yas gzugs ni shing rta mkhan/ /gyur tshe de bzhin

gshegs pa 'od zhi la/ /pa la shi ka dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs rnam par snang mdzad khar ba mkhan/ /gyur tshe bde gshegs mi'i gzi byin la/ /me long gcig cig dbul ba byas nas kyang / /

dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs rin chen tog ni nor bu mkhan gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams stegs bzang la/ /nor bu dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde

gshegs the tsom spangs pa rgyal po yi/ /btsun mor gyur tshe bde gshegs brtson brtan la/ /me tog bskyed mos tshal dag phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs 'jig rten 'das pa ma mi khar/ /

gyur tshe bde gshegs thub par grags de la/ /dbu zhu gcig cig dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs don yod rnam gnon mi mjed bdag /tshangs tshe bde gshegs grags pa rgyal

mtshan la/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rtogs par mdzad pa pos/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 'od de la/ /spos kyi ri lu dag ni

phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs me tog rgyal mtshan rgyal bu'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas gsal de la/ /rtswa yis bkab pa'i khang bzangs phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub

tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs ri dbang rgyal po 'dreg mkhan tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid che de'i/ /dbu skra legs par breg pa byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs gzi brjid

chen po 'bru mar mkhan/ /gyur tshe bde gshegs dgra bcom mchod 'os kyi/ /gtsug lag khang du spos bsgos 'bru mar phul/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs don mdzad gzigs pa tal ba'i tshe/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi mchog de la/ /lhang tsher leb leb po dag phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs grags pa mtha' yas 'khor los sgyur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa don grub sems dpa'

de la ni/ /'dzam bu'i chu'i gser gyi gdugs stong phul nas kyang / /dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lha ni 'dzam gling gi/ /rgyal por gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgas mchod la/ /'bras bu'i

bskyed mos tshal dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa don gnas mkhyen pa chang 'tshong gi/ /bur gyur tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa kun du sbed/ /srang du gshegs tshe

thal mo sbyar te phyag byas nas/ /dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo rdzogs rgyal bu'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu dang ba la/ /me tog dag las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas/ /

dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs mya ngan med pa dpa' bo'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros sems pa de/ /'jigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis spyan drangs nas/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems
bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma bral ba yis/ /sems can kun la yud tsam byams bsgoms nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nges byung blo de la/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs lha shing srungs tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i dbyangs de la/ /bu ram shing gi sdong bu phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i dbang

phyug ni/ /dge slong gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs pa po/ /sna tshogs gsung ba'i chos gdan bting nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs me tog spyan ni rgyal po yi/ /mir gyur tshe na bde gshegs 'brug sgra la/ /

ud pal dmar po dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs rnam 'byes sku ni btso blag mkhan/ /gyur tshe bde gshegs 'od chen phung po yi/ /na bza' dag ni bkru bshal byas nas kyang / /

dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'od kyis ni grong dag dang / /yul 'khor rnams su pha rol phyin drug sgra bsgrags nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ni brtsegs pa de la yang / /dang po nyid du

byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs kun gzigs stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i tshe/ /gtsug lag khang mchog bye ba drug bcu byed bcug nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med par dga' de la/ /dang po nyid du byang chub

bde gshegs yon tan 'od gsal phyag dar par/ /gyur tshe bde gshegs yul 'khor lha de la/ /rdo leb gdan dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla zhal bram

ze'i bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge dga' ba'i dbyangs de la/ /kan ta ra'i me tog dag ni gtor nas kyang / /dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs rin chen 'od ni ded dpon tshe/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas de la/ /rin po che'i sgron ma phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs rin chen tog ni lcags mgar tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mthong na dga' de la/ /

ljags bzhar dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa grags bla chang tshong tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma'i rgyal po la/ /'dzam bu'i ro bro ba dag
phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs 'od byed tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi tog de la/ /mu shi kab sha'i me tog gtor nas kyang / /

dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs gzi brjid dpag med phreng rgyud tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs su rnam grags la/ /pad ma 'dab brgya pa dag phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems
bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen gos 'tshong tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spyan sdug de la ni/ /ras yug dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs
seng ge'i sku ni spos 'tshong tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i tog de la/ /spos kyi phur ma dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs mkhas blo tshogs dpon khol
po'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med sbyin de la/ /me tog chun po dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal dka' lha'i bu'i tshe/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa rgyu skar rgyal po la/ /me tog man dA ra ba phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan phung po ni/ /sAl chen lta bu'i bram ze'i bur gyur tshe/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba lha de la/ /phreng phul dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla tog spos 'tshong tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od de yi/ /khang pa brtsegs

par spos byug phyir phul nas/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mthu thob shing srungs tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa che de la/ /dgun shing dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por

byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs mthu rtsal mtha' yas tshong dpon gyi/ /bu tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dbyangs la/ /se 'bru dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs

zla ba bram ze'i bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ston par dgyes de la/ /ud pal chang pa gang zhig phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri med tshong dpon gyi/ /bu tshe de bzhin

gshegs pa grags bla la/ /me tog 'bar zhing skye ba'i sa gzhi phul/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs don kun gzigs pa ded dpon tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po la/ /mu tig dag

gi phreng ba phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo spos 'tshong tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dmar ser 'od de la/ /tsan dan dag gi gdan khri phul nas kyang / /dang por

byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs 'byor ldan tshong 'dus pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar 'dud de la/ /snyun rkyen gsos sman mar dag phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /
bde gshegs bsod nams ba lang rdzi'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros sems de la/ /snod dag zho yis bkang ste phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs sgron ma

tshal gyi las byed tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbyig gsal de la ni/ /a mra'i 'bras bu dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'od 'phro ni/ /ro bro

'tshong tshe de bzhin gshegs pa po/ /skyon zhi de la kha ra'i dum bu phul/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo yangs kun rgyu'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar rgyal po la/ /lo ma dag gi ri lu phul

nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs legs skyes rgya mtsho'i tshong pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyings dang bral de la/ /na bza' stong phrag brgya ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub

tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nor lha shing 'tshong tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo gsal de la ni/ /rtswa bam sgron me dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs yid gnyis spong ba

gser mgar tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis sel mdzad la/ /gser gyi me tog dag ni gtor nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs 'dzin pa dpag med gser rtog tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

byams pa'i dpal de la/ /gser ni spar gang gtor te phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchog srid sde dpon gyi/ /bu tshe de bzhin gshegs pa gtso mchog la/ /gser las byas

pa'i gdugs dag phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa choms med lcags mgar tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs gsung de la/ /a ha da ka dbul ba byas nas kyang / /

dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs mi gnas grong khyer rtan pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gzigs de la/ /me tog rangs pa dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa der gnas thags mkhan tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba gzigs de la/ /sku rags dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs tshogs chen

gtso bo mgon med bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud zil gnon pa de la ni/ /mon sran gre'u'i 'bru mar mar me phul nas kyang / /dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs 'gro ba'i 'od zer

'khor los sgyur ba'i tshe/ /bde gshegs shing rta chen po 'khor bcas bye stong la/ /rgyal po'i zhal zas dag ni brim pa byas nas kyang / /dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phal chen 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshe/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stobs kyis gshegs de la/ /dpag tshad bcu gnyis khyon tsam bskyed mos tshal phul nas/ /dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs rgyal ni 'bru mar mkhan gyi tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

'od zer tshim de la/ /zhabs bsku ba dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mtha' yas khrus pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun du sbed pa de la ni/ /'dag pa'i chal gyis

snod dag bkang ste phul nas kyang / /dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs don gyi blo gros nad pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa don grub mthu rtsal la/ /kha ra'i dum bu dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub

tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs sman pa'i rgyal po phye 'tshong tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od de la/ /phye yi bsod snyoms dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs tha ba spangs

pa sman pa'i tshe/ /dge 'dun dag la mar khu phul nas kyang / /de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pa'i phung po la/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs rims med shing bzo mkhan gyi tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

rnam dag blo de la/ /shing rta dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa legs byin bram ze'i bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can mya ngan 'das pa na/ /

mar me'i phreng ba dngar ba stong snyed phul nas kyang / /dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa grags byin grong khyer mchod rten la/ /rten pa'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu gsal/ /

grong khyer dag tu gshegs kar me tog gtor nas kyang / /dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog byin pa ni/ /nor bu mkhan tshe de bzhin gshegs pa po/ /yon tan 'od la

nor bu'i bla re phul/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs skyes bus byin pa thags mkhan tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i sgron de la/ /ras kyi kha tshar dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni

sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i sde ni phreng rgyud kyi/ /bu mor gyur tshe bde gshegs 'byor ldan 'od zer la/ /me tog mya ngan 'tshang dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems
bskyed do/ /bde gshegs phal chen byin ni gar mkhan tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ston par dgyes de la/ /tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs
bzhi ba'i blo gros rgyal po'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa legs par don sems la/ /bar shi me tog dri ldan gtor nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spos glang gdugs
mkhan tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gzigs de la/ /gro ba dag las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sred med bu ni khyim bdag tshe/ /'brog

dgon dag tu dge slong dge 'dun btung chu phul/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rgyal mtshan de la ni/ /dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa des pa dman las byed bu'i tshe/ /bslab pa'i

gzhi lnga dag las gzung ba byas nas kyang / /de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam par gnas pa de la ni/ /dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs mi tshugs nad pa mgon med bor ba'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa mthu rtsal chen po de yi lam/ /lag mthil tsam zhig phyag dar legs par byas nas kyang / /dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla gau tam tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas mchog pad spyan la/ /

dbyar gnas dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa glog tog rgya mtsho'i tshong pa'i tshe/ /khru brgyad kyis bskor spug las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa nyi ma'i 'od zer de la ni/ /dang por nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa las byed tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba mtha' yas la/ /las btang byas pas rnyed pa phul nas kyang / /

dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sbas shing srungs tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gzugs de la/ /a mra dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems

bskyed do/ /bde gshegs ye shes nyi ma rdza mkhan tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i gdugs de la/ /lhung bzed dang ni kun d+he phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa don grub

sman pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer la/ /spos kyi reng bu dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lhun brtsegs khral mi'i tshe/ /bde gshegs yul 'khor

kha lo sgyur de la/ /lhags pa'i dus su shing khur gcig phul nas/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dga' 'dul ya nga ba'i/ /dpyad mkhan tshe na bde gshegs legs mthong dag /'brog

dgon bzhugs tshe lhang tsher gdugs phul nas/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma phreng rgyud tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bshes gnyen bzhed de la/ /pad ma dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /

dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom grags pa ni/ /nor bu mkhan tshe bde gshegs skal bzhed la/ /nor bu rin chen me shel gcig phul nas/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /

bde gshegs ye shes 'gros ni klu rgyal tshe/ /bde gshegs nyi zhal sos ka'i dus dag tu/ /lam du zhugs tshe char pa phab nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs nyon mongs bral ba gar mkhan tshe/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med spyan de la/ /me tog chun po dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs 'dam bu dbul po'i bur gyur tshe/ /dgon par bde gshegs seng ge'i stabs de la/ /

bshos dron dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs spos bzangs bram ze'i bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma che de la/ /lo ma dag las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas/ /

dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs yul 'khor srungs ni shing srungs tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhon par mdzad de la/ /bsil yab dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /
bde gshegs lha grags grong khyer brten pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gsal de la/ /gso ras na bza' dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs srid mtha'
gzigs pa lam ston tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams snying po yi/ /lam srang dag ni mtshon pa byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba spos
'tshong tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos de 'chad pa'i tshe/ /dus kyi rjes 'brang spos ni zho gcig phul/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa grags can las kyi tshe/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa lha dga' de la ni/ /phyag 'khar gcig cig dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs rin chen zla ba rgyal bu'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs med

dgyes de la/ /ta la pa ta dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs seng ge'i rgyal mtshan rdza mkhan tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab rgyal mtshan la/ /sum pa ka'i lhung bzed phul

nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs bsam gtan dgyes pa grong khyer gyi/ /pho nya'i tshe na bde gshegs mdangs 'od la/ /me tog chun po dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs ldan rngon pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zlas byin de la ni/ /mig mi 'dzums par blta ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam rol rgyal

bu'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dbyig de la/ /dpag tshad khor yug me tog chal bkram phul/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs yon tan rin chen ljongs gtso'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa mtha' yas 'od de la/ /me tog tsam pa ka dag phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs dgra bcom grags pa mnyan pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa des pa po de ni/ /gru dag las ni bsgral ba

byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs pad ngos 'bru mar mkhan gyi tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i tog de la/ /dri zhim zhabs bsku ba dag phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems
